sources.title: Bandit Queen (1950) BARBARA BRITTON
sources.description:
It's Friday @PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Barbara Britton, Phillip Reed, Barton MacLane
Director: William Berke

A spirited and determined woman takes up with Joaquin Murietta --the Robin Hood of the West--to take vengeance on the corrupt men who wronged her and restore stolen gold to its rightful owners.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

sources.title: Bandit Queen (1950) Barbara Britton - Western Outlaw Legend - Vengeful & Vicious!
sources.description:
EVERY MAN WAS A TARGET...for her lash...her bullets...her kisses!
After tragedy strikes, Zara Montalvo (Barbara Britton) carves her own path as a lawless legend, relentlessly hunted by Sheriff Harden (Barton MacLane). With Dan Hinsdale (Willard Parker) caught in the middle, Zara aims to settle scores, forcing a final duel where bullet justice decides all.


Watch the Colorized version : https://youtu.be/gaBl2Egd5zc

Director: William Berke
Writers: Orville H. Hampton, Budd Lesser, Victor West
Stars: Barbara Britton, Willard Parker, Phillip Reed
Genres: Western, Adventure, Action
Release date: December 22, 1950

@CultCinemaClassics

sources.title: Bandit Queen 1950 colorized (Barbara Britton)
sources.description: A woman returns to her native California in time to see her parents murdered by the sheriff and his gang for their hacienda and their gold. Posing as an American visitor from Detroit, she adopts a Zorro-like costume and teams up with militia leader Dan Hinsdale and freedom fighter Joaquin Murietta to take vengeance on the gang and restore all the stolen gold to its rightful owners. Barbara Britton as Zara Montalvo AKA Lola Belmont Willard Parker as Dan Hinsdale Phillip Reed as Joaquin Murietta AKA Carlos Del Rio Barton MacLane as Sheriff Jim Harden Martin Garralaga as Father Antonio Victor Kilian as Jose Montalvo Thurston Hall as the Governor Angelo Rossitto as Nino Anna Demetrio as Maria Paul Marion as Manuel I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.

metadata.Plot: Zara Montalvo, half Spanish and half American, returns to her native California in time to see her parents murdered for their hacienda and gold by Sheriff Jim Harding and his gang. Posing as Lola Belmont, an American visiting from Detroit, she teams up with Joaquin Murietta, posing as Carlos Del Rio, to form a Robin-Hood type band that takes vengeance on the gang and restores stolen gold to its rightful owners, aided by militia leader Dan Hinsdale.
metadata.Writer: Orville H. Hampton, Budd Lesser, Victor West
metadata.Actors: Barbara Britton, Willard Parker, Phillip Reed
